text:
@BetteMidler Bette! Help this queer rabbi (who has loved you since I was kid) get the word out to urge our GA governor to rescind his new executive order!

Please consider signing this petition urging @BrianKempGA to rescind his executive order.  

https://t.co/UdIJfYuGrK

#coronavirus #kemp
